modules.title: Newspaper Chase - Vocabulary & Story
modules.description: Level 0 hikayesi Newspaper Chase için temel kelimeler, kısa hikaye özeti ve sınav.

words.example: I read a newspaper every morning.
The thief runs away from the shop.
The police are looking for the thief.
The shop is next to the bank.

story.title: Newspaper Chase (Kısa Özet)
story.intro_tr: Bir gazete dağıtıcısı ve kaçan bir hırsızın kısa macerası.
paragraphs: A boy is delivering newspapers early in the morning. The streets are quiet and the sky is still dark.
Suddenly, a thief runs out of a jewelry shop. He has a bag in his hand and he jumps into a car.
The boy sees the thief and the car. Later, he helps the police to find the criminal.
In the end, the police catch the thief and the boy becomes a small hero in his town.

quiz.question: The boy helps the police in the story.

modules.title: Carnival - Vocabulary & Story
modules.description: Carnival hikayesindeki temel kelimeler ve kısa bir özet ile sınav.

words.example: There is a big crowd in the street.
The float moves slowly in the parade.

story.title: Carnival (Kısa Özet)
story.intro_tr: Renkli kostümler, müzik ve kalabalıklarla dolu bir karnaval günü.
paragraphs: It is carnival day in the town. The streets are full of people and colourful decorations.
There are many floats, dancers and musicians. Everyone is happy and excited.
In the middle of the crowd, a small problem appears and the hero of the story must act.
At the end of the day, the problem is solved and the carnival finishes with fireworks.

quiz.question: There is only one person in the street on carnival day.
